name: AcutePepticUlcer
title: Acute Peptic Ulcer
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for peptic ulcer.),(Data Element Scope: Includes ICD-10 and SNOMED codes associated with active peptic ulcer.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD-10 codes associated with active peptic ulcer.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

Acute peptic ulcer, site unspecified, with both hemorrhage and perforation
Acute peptic ulcer, site unspecified, without hemorrhage or perforation
